text: Myliobatiformes is one of the four groups of batoids. It is made up of cartilaginous fishes. They are related to the shark family. They were recently re-classified as part of the monophyletic group, after being part of the Rajiformes group. Another relative to Myliobatiformes is the common form of skates.Ichthyology: Ray and Skate Basics Florida Museum of Natural History ==Families== * Platyrhinidae * Zanobatidae * Myliobatoidei * Hexatrygonidae * Plesiobatidae * Urolophidae * Urotrygonidae * Dasyatidae ==References== Category:Rays
title: Myliobatiformes
